adverbs.description: lichtly (comparative more lichtly, superlative most lichtly)

entries.meaning: (Scotland) lightly; gently or without great force.
(Scotland) In a manner that is not serious.

verbs.description: lichtly (third-person singular simple present lichtlies, present participle lichtlying, simple past and past participle lichtlied)

entries.meaning: (Scotland) To slight; to treat contemptuously or without seriousness.
